What is friend 5s specific denomination

Source: R/gss_vars_120.R
frndden5.Rd

frndden5

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question What specific denomination is that, if any? (PROBE FOR EXACT DENOMINATION. REFER TO PROTESTANT DENOMINATION LIST AND CIRCLE APPROPRIATE CODE BELOW). 5. Denomination of Fifth Person
